Package com.opera.core.systems.scope.stp.services

Implementations of the Scope service interfaces.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MockEcmascriptDebugger  
    ScopeConsoleLogger  
    ScopeCookieManager
    Cookie manager to manage cookies via Scope.
    ScopeCore  
    ScopeEcmascriptDebugger
    Manages the ecmascript-debugger service Handles runtime management and script injection.
    ScopeEcmascriptDebugger6
    EcmaScript debugger 6.0 implementation handles injection and runtime management to the new version of debugger.
    ScopeEcmascriptService
    ScopeEcmascriptService is a lightweight service to enable JavaScript injection.
    ScopeExec
    The exec service handles user interactions such as key presses, mouse clicks, screenshot grabbing and executing actions on Opera.
    ScopePrefs  
    ScopeSelftest  
    ScopeSelftest.ScopeSelftestResult  
    ScopeSelftest.ScopeSelftestResult.Builder
    A builder for creating SelftestResult emulation profiles.
    ScopeWindowManager
    The Window Manager service handles events such as opening a URL, filtering and closing windows, and tracks windows being loaded.

Implementations of the Scope service interfaces.
